alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 9:08PM CDT until June 18 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LEAKE...NORTHEASTERN RANKIN...NORTHERN SCOTT AND EAST CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES... At 908 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Farmhaven, or 15 miles east of Canton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Ludlow around 915 PM CDT. Lena around 925 PM CDT. Tuscola around 935 PM CDT. Walnut Grove, Standing Pine and Harperville around 940 PM CDT. Steele around 945 PM CDT. Madden around 950 PM CDT. Sebastopol around 955 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central Mississippi. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
